amendment.description: To prescribe the binding oath or affirmation of renunciation and allegiance required to be naturalized as a citizen of the United States, to encourage and support the efforts of prospective citizens of the United States to become citizens, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3193 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 1. Record Vote Number: 85.

action.text: Amendment SA 3193 proposed by Senator Alexander to Amendment SA 3192. (consideration: CR S2590) To prescribe the binding oath or affirmation of renunciation and allegiance required to be naturalized as a citizen of the United States, to encourage and support the efforts of prospective citizens of the United States to become citizens, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3193 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 1. Record Vote Number: 85.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3193 proposed by Senator Alexander to Amendment SA 3192.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3193 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 1. Record Vote Number: 85.
